entry.title: HEAT WARNING, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 a.m. MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
